wikipedia_page.main: Charles Andrew John Morris (born 6 July 1992) is an English cricketer active 2012 to 2014 who plays for Worcestershire. He has appeared in twenty two first-class eleven List A and two T20 Matches as a righthanded batsman who bowled right arm medium fast.  He took 56 First Class wickets in his first full season with Worcestershire and helped them gain promotion to Division 1 Cricket.
